channel.title: Need some help!
channel.description: Ok is there anyway to like update my server with rs2 updates such as skill capes that actually look like skill capes? EX: Some people claim to have skill capes but they are a lame fremmenick style skill cape. Is there any way i can get the updated skill capes? Im basiclly looking for someone who can tell me how to update my server for more items.

item.title: Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

Silabsoft has released a client able to use/see etc Skillcapes and the Dark Bow.
But you need a source which either you have edited or are going to use to be able to see it.
I recommend looking in the Downloads Section you can find what your looking for there.

Read full topic
